awd_titl_txt: Acquisition of a Gas Chromatography - Combustion Interface  for a Stable Isotope Mass Spectrometer
awd_abstract_narration: Dr. Popp proposes to acquire a gas chromatography-combustion                    interface through this grant.  This unit will be part of a mass                 spectrometer system requested through a proposal (91-17610) to                  the Division of Earth Sciences (EAR).  The equipment requested                  will provide the ability to analyze carbon, oxygen, nitrogen,                   sulfur, and hydrogen isotopic compounds.  To-date, this type of                 equipment has not been widely applied for oceanographic research.                                                                                               Matching funds from the University of Hawaii will be provided to                purchase the entire system.  This proposal offers a chance to                   apply a new technology and opens the technology for shared-use                  among many oceanographers.  As one reviewer stated "This is a                   modest request of Ocean Sciences and one which will pay many                    returns".
